tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SystemLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_type VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DebugInfo (
    debug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    operation_name VARCHAR(100),
    debug_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE BlockchainLogs (
    blockchain_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    block_number INT,
    log_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE TransactionLogs (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    log_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE NodeStatus (
    node_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT
)
